overview: As Chief Executive Officer of KIMBIA, Dan leads the development and execution of KIMBIA’s corporate strategy. Dan is a seasoned executive, with fifteen years experience in starting, leading, building and managing early-stage companies. Prior to joining KIMBIA, he founded, built and managed a successful professional advisory services business. He also served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of an early-stage broadband access company where he raised $120 million in growth capital and built the necessary systems to manage the expansion of the companyâ€™s nationwide broadband network from four to forty-eight cities and its employee base from forty-five to two-hundred. Dan worked for a number of years as an investment banker with Credit Suisse First Boston, advising companies on corporate finance and mergers and acquisitions, and he began his career as an accountant with PriceWaterhouse and PepsiCo.
